post.html:
Hello! And welcome to the Introduction to Swift and iOS Development by Maximiliano Firtman.

This is a course to start with Swift, SwiftUI, Xcode and iOS App development published with Frontend Masters.

Requirements

  • You need a macOS computer and to install Xcode from AppStore

  • You also need to download the workshop's assets.

Companion websites

  • API and Webapp used in the app
  • Xcode source code repository
post.title: Introduction
